page.title: 02WALSGRAVE VILLAGE
page.content: Walsgrave is an historic village with quite a few old cottages still left.As I live on the Mount Pleasant estate in Walsgrave I see some of these old cottages every day when I walk to school.St.Mary's church in Walsgrave is very old and is one of the oldest in Coventry.I live in a house which is about twenty years old.Before they were built it would have been just fields.There are still many fields left close by.When my grandma was a little girl,which was about seventy years ago,there were hardly any houses at all in Walsgrave and she used to come here for a day out in the country.But now Walsgrave is most well known for its hospital which is one of the best in Britain.
